subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kyle Farnsworth threw a first-pitch fastball at 97 miles an hour behind the head of Boston’s Manny Ramírez after Ramírez had hit two home runs against the Yankees.
snippet: Kyle Farnsworth threw a first-pitch fastball at 97 miles an hour behind the head of Boston’s Manny Ramírez after Ramírez had hit two home runs against the Yankees.
